short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to prefill sell inputs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of painstakingly typing in item prices for your listings on your favorite online TCG marketplace? Introducing Cardmarket Companion, the unofficial Chrome extension designed exclusively for sellers like you. Say goodbye to manual data entry and hello to effortless pricing!

Key Features:

📈 Dynamic Price Prefilling: With Cardmarket Companion, you can automatically prefill your item prices with real-time trending data. Choose from trend data spanning 1, 7, or 30 days to stay competitive in the marketplace.

🚀 Seller's Secret Weapon: Gain an edge over your competition by leveraging the latest pricing trends. Cardmarket Companion helps you make informed pricing decisions that can lead to increased sales and profits.

🕵️ Unofficial Advantage: Our unofficial extension is designed by sellers, for sellers. Enjoy the freedom to use Cardmarket Companion without constraints, empowering you to run your online business your way.

🔒 Privacy First: Rest assured, your sensitive pricing data remains private and secure. We don't compromise on your data security.

💡 Efficiency Boost: Save valuable time and effort by automating price inputs. Focus on growing your business while Cardmarket Companion handles the pricing details.

How to Get Started:

1. Download and install the Cardmarket Companion extension.
2. Navigate to Cardmarket.
3. Select the item you want to list and its corresponding input fields.
4. Choose the desired trend duration (1, 7, or 30 days).
5. Watch as Cardmarket Companion fills in the item's price based on the selected trend, helping you set competitive prices effortlessly.


Feel free to support me by hitting the donation button 😁
